name: Just Drive (Andypoo)
description:
Remember those days as a kid, driving hot wheels cars onto a road map rug? Andypoo Games developed this game so your can relive your childhood memories on PC with 6 maps and some easter eggs. 

-MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS-

OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 

64-bit Processor: Intel Pentium CPU B980 @ 2.40GHz

Installed Memory (RAM): 4 GB 

Video: OpenGL 3.2 Support with 512 MB Memory  

Screen Resolution: 1280x720 

Storage: 189 MB of Free Space 

Mouse: 3-Button Microsoft-Compatible Mouse
